title: Twitter reacts to Israel Adesanya's title-winning KO of Robert Whittaker at UFC 243
text:
By: Mike Bohn | October 6, 2019 12:35 am

Gallery Israel Adesanya def. Robert Whittaker at UFC 243: Best photos view 27 images

Israel Adesanya successfully unified the middleweight title on Saturday when he defeated Robert Whittaker for undisputed UFC gold in the UFC 243 headliner.

Adesanya’s (18-0 MMA, 7-0 UFC) undefeated career reached the pinnacle when he scored a second-round knockout victory to dethrone Whittaker (20-5 MMA, 11-3 UFC) in the 185-pound title bout, which headlined the pay-per-view card from Marvel Stadium in Melbourne, Australia.

Check below for the top Twitter reactions to Adesanya’s title win over Whittaker at UFC 243.

* * * *

It's time to unify the middleweight belt! @RobWhittakerMMA and Israel Adesanya (@stylebender) are about to step in the octagon for the #UFC243 main event. Full play-by-play: https://t.co/nxXLw1AHHh pic.twitter.com/9gauKcvQoA — MMA Junkie (@MMAjunkie) October 6, 2019

Bitter sweet watching this mw fight . Knowing the opportunities I squandered . But these two earned this moment excited to watch . May the best man win . Working to earn my shot ! #UFC243 🙏🏾 — Derek Brunson (@DerekBrunson) October 6, 2019

Whittaker's jab is so weird — Matheus Aquino (@MatheusDCAquino) October 6, 2019

Whittaker is so amazing at breaking the rhythm of his opponent. #UFC243 — Seán Sheehan (@SeanSheehanBA) October 6, 2019

Whitaker is doing a good job entering in off his left hook and jab. — Brandon Gibson (@SixGunGibson) October 6, 2019

Left hook from Adesanya and they clinch. Possible eye poke on the exit if not a headbutt. Quick restart though. #UFC243 — Bloody Elbow (@BloodyElbow) October 6, 2019

Adesanya wiped his eye on the ref LOL 🤣 #UFC243 — 🍆Big🍆Structural🍆Change (@Sugarhigh5me) October 6, 2019

Huge knockdown by Adesanya right at the end of the round! — Kevin Iole (@KevinI) October 6, 2019

Saved by the bell!!! — michael (@bisping) October 6, 2019

He just got flash knocked — michael (@bisping) October 6, 2019

Ooohhhh! Great first round by Rob and then bang! Israel drops him with a left hook in the final second of the round. Might have been saved by the bell. I think you give Israel the round off that. That could have been a fight-ending shot. 10-9 Israel. — Brett Okamoto (@bokamotoESPN) October 6, 2019

This fight has my Heart racing #ufc243 #mainevent — Jessica Eye (@jessicaevileye) October 6, 2019

Did Whitaker come in too emotional #JustBang #UFC243 — Rock n Rumble (@ElvisSinosic) October 6, 2019

This is a kickboxing match…Perfect for Adesanya — Gerald Harris (@GHurricane) October 6, 2019

If Whitaker plans on shooting, he should do so sooner than later — Brandon Gibson (@SixGunGibson) October 6, 2019

Israel Adesanya stops Rober Whittaker with strikes in the second round. — Luke Thomas (@lthomasnews) October 6, 2019

Wow that’s a baaaad man — Belal Muhammad (@bullyb170) October 6, 2019

The biggest star in the @ufc is HERE @stylebender #UFC243 biggest gate EVER 🔥 🔥 🔥 — Brendan Schaub (@BrendanSchaub) October 6, 2019

Wow!! Masterful performance by the new champ! — Jimmy Smith (@jimmysmithmma) October 6, 2019

😮 😮 😮 — Anthony Rocco Martin (@TonyRoccoMartin) October 6, 2019

My wish list Usman, Colby, Isreal, Khabib. That order — Tyron T-Wood Woodley (@TWooodley) October 6, 2019

The best middle weight ever is @stylebender no question about it. Congrats Bro👏👏👏.#thelaststylebender#UFC243 — Francis Ngannou (@francis_ngannou) October 6, 2019

Adesanya inspiring all the skinny mother fuckers in the UFC #UFC243 — Angela Hill (@AngieOverkill) October 6, 2019

Amazing performance @stylebender!

That movement to evade and counters! Damn! — Krzysztof Soszynski (@KSOSufc) October 6, 2019

Israel Adesanya (@stylebender) stops Robert Whittaker by second-round TKO and becomes the 13th undefeated, undisputed champion in UFC history. #UFC243 pic.twitter.com/gCImnB3gU4 — Mike Bohn (@MikeBohnMMA) October 6, 2019
description: See the top Twitter reactions to Israel Adesanya's title victory against Robert Whittaker in the UFC 243 main event.
